confirm-email.title: Email confirmation
confirm-email.subtitle: We have sent you an email with a confirmation code. Please enter this code below

confirm-mfa.title: Verify your account
confirm-mfa.subtitle: Enter the code listed in your Google Authenticator app below

forgot-password.subtitle_1: We'll send you a raven with a secret code to restore your password
forgot-password.subtitle_2: Unwrap the scroll that a raven has delivered to your email and enter a secret code below.
forgot-password.subtitle_3: You've proved your right to restore the former glory. Now just enter a new password.

validation_messages.password_rules: The password must contain at least 1 capital letter and 1 digit

new-password.title: Trial is over
new-password.subtitle: You've proved your right to restore the former glory. Now just enter a new password.
